text.div:
Value Set Contents

This value set contains 11 concepts

CodeSystemDisplay
26342005http://snomed.info/sctMedical evaluation for speech, language and/or hearing problems (regime/therapy)
41375007http://snomed.info/sctMedical evaluation of hearing problem (procedure)
77837000http://snomed.info/sctMedical evaluation of speech, language and hearing problem (procedure)
91515000http://snomed.info/sctSpecial audiologic evaluation for functional hearing loss (procedure)
92521http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cptEvaluation of speech fluency (eg, stuttering, cluttering)
92522http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cptEvaluation of speech sound production (eg, articulation, phonological process, apraxia, dysarthria)
92523http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cptEvaluation of speech sound production (eg, articulation, phonological process, apraxia, dysarthria); with evaluation of language comprehension and expression (eg, receptive and expressive language)
92524http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cptBehavioral and qualitative analysis of voice and resonance
92540http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cptBasic vestibular evaluation, includes spontaneous nystagmus test with eccentric gaze fixation nystagmus, with recording, positional nystagmus test, minimum of 4 positions, with recording, optokinetic nystagmus test, bidirectional foveal and peripheral stimulation, with recording, and oscillating tracking test, with recording
92557http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cptComprehensive audiometry threshold evaluation and speech recognition (92553 and 92556 combined)
92625http://www.ama-assn.org/go/cptAssessment of tinnitus (includes pitch, loudness matching, and masking)

contains.display: Medical evaluation for speech, language and/or hearing problems (regime/therapy)
Medical evaluation of speech, language and hearing problem (procedure)
Special audiologic evaluation for functional hearing loss (procedure)
Evaluation of speech fluency (eg, stuttering, cluttering)
Evaluation of speech sound production (eg, articulation, phonological process, apraxia, dysarthria)
Evaluation of speech sound production (eg, articulation, phonological process, apraxia, dysarthria); with evaluation of language comprehension and expression (eg, receptive and expressive language)
Behavioral and qualitative analysis of voice and resonance

Basic vestibular evaluation, includes spontaneous nystagmus test with eccentric gaze fixation nystagmus, with recording, positional nystagmus test, minimum of 4 positions, with recording, optokinetic nystagmus test, bidirectional foveal and peripheral stimulation, with recording, and oscillating tracking test, with recording
Comprehensive audiometry threshold evaluation and speech recognition (92553 and 92556 combined)
Assessment of tinnitus (includes pitch, loudness matching, and masking)
